description: The absorption Trap is sent when a trap has been
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorptionTrap ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorStamp u 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorTrapId i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorCounter u 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorTime u 9999

description: The time stamp of the absorbed trap.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorStamp

description: The trap identifier of the absorbed trap.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorTrapId

description: The number of the iterations of the absorbed trap.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorCounter

description: The time stamp of the last iteration.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-TRAP-MGR-MIB::trapAbsorTime
